Get V1 API sentiment for terms

Source: R/gdelt_full_text_api.R
get_data_sentiment_ft_api_terms.Rd

Get V1 API sentiment for terms

get_data_sentiment_ft_api_terms(terms = c("Zika",
  "\"Golden State Warriors\""), visualization = NULL, domain = NA,
  last_minutes = NA, is_tone = T, tone_less_than = NA,
  tone_more_than = NA, source_language = NA, sort_by = "date",
  dedeup_results = T, nest_data = F, return_message = T)

Arguments

terms

vector of terms
visualization

if `TRUE` returns a visualization
domain

vector of domain
last_minutes

how long
is_tone

use tone
tone_less_than

tone minimum
tone_more_than

tone maximum
source_language

vector search language
sort_by

sort by
dedeup_results

if `TRUE` dedupes results
nest_data

if `TRUE` returns nested data frame
return_message

if `TRUE` returns a messaage

Value

a `tibble` or a ggplot visualiation

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_data_sentiment_ft_api_terms(terms = c("Zika", "Brooklyn Nets"), visualization = T)
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
